sentence.Network_en: For a moment she continued to look at him resentfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 她怨恨地看了他一会儿。

sentence.Network_en: He meditated resentfully on the physical texture of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 他满心忿忿不平,左思右想着生活的物质方面.
他愤慨地两眼直瞪着亚当.

resentful 怨恨型, resentfully 充满忿恨地, resentful 有抵触情绪

list.abs: the driver said resentfully ., 开车的那个气呼呼地嘟哝.

entry.def: If you are resentful, you feel resentment.

example.ex: At first I felt very resentful and angry about losing my job...
example.tran: 起初我对丢掉工作感到非常怨恨和恼怒。

example.ex: He turned away in sullen, resentful silence.
example.tran: 他闷闷不乐、心怀怨恨、一言不发地转过身去了。

means.word_mean: 1. with resentment; in a resentful manner;

sentences.sentence: "the best doctors would stay resentfully out of the national service, refusing to become the minions of a Minister"

auth_sentence.content: If I were a dog, I thought resentfully, these women would show me a bit more consideration.
auth_sentence.res_content: If I were a dog, I thought resentfully, these women would show me a bit more consideration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If I were a dog, I thought resentfully, these women would show me a bit more consideration.
